title: How sexy would it be if there was Zyra merch.
body: I couldn't imagine how cool a Zyra jacket would be with the thorns on arms. I'm getting custom made Zyra bunny ears in the fall. I was just fantasizing on Zyra merch in general. How does the community feel on this??? Any champion you guys would love to have merch???? :D

replies.body: I'd love to hold {{champion:268}}'s staff in my hand.
